subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The former Tennessee coach Phillip Fulmer said Saturday that Lane Kiffin’s “arrogant attitude turned people off” and wondered how Kiffin was able to land prestigious head coaching jobs at Tennessee and Southern California.
snippet: The former Tennessee coach Phillip Fulmer said Saturday that Lane Kiffin’s “arrogant attitude turned people off” and wondered how Kiffin was able to land prestigious head coaching jobs at Tennessee and Southern California.
